price: Katakanlah, "Kalau seandainya ada malaikat-malaikat yang berjalan-jalan sebagai penghuni di bumi, niscaya Kami turunkan dari langit kepada mereka seorang malaikat menjadi rasul".
arabic: قُل لَّوۡ كَانَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَلَٰٓئِكَةٞ يَمۡشُونَ مُطۡمَئِنِّينَ لَنَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَلَكٗا رَّسُولٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul law kāna fī al-arḍi malāikatun yamshūna muṭ'ma-innīna lanazzalnā ʿalayhim mina al-samāi malakan rasūlan
